title: While in 2020, why hasn't the Supreme Court been this conservative since the 1930s? - Quora
tags: History of the United States of America

response.answer_text: The Supreme court has had a republican majority since 1971 Since 1975 it has been 6–3 then 7–2, even for a few years 8–1 Republican . Since 1975, the only time Dems had 4 was ~2010 until RGB’s death Without looking further I Think only about 30 of the last 150 years have been majority democrat
